messages.title: Competent Leadership
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap leads more into work.

messages.title: Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Bosses queue up to warn: Miliband will bankrupt Britain.

messages.title: A strong voice for York Central
messages.content: My priorities for our area include:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: York is a city to live and work in, not just a tourist attraction.
This city has so much potential that a Conservative government can help unlock.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting York's public services in a growing city
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need ambitious schools, excellent healthcare and responsive local police.

issues.economy: Tax cuts for workers and savers. The deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses.
issues.socialWelfare: Benefits cap leads more into work

quotes.text: You're getting £10 off with the Tories
quotes.source: Tax cuts for workers and savers

images.caption: A strong voice for York Central, Robert McIlveen, Conservatives, with portrait of Robert McIlveen and Conservative Party logo.
